name: YouTube Glass Design
description:
YouTube, but glassier.
!!!!! IMPORTANT !!!!! This style will not look like the screenshots unless your browser supports backdrop-filter. https://caniuse.com/#feat=css-backdrop-filter To enable this in Chrome, go to chrome://flags/#enable-experimental-web-platform-features and enable it. Otherwise this just makes everything transparent.
Blurring the player controls' background does not work well with opacity changes, therefore it slides out once enabled.
